select * from CMIS_PRO where not product_last_average_price is null
and product_name like '%${keyword}%'
and product_hot_sale_price like '%${keyword}%'
order by product_last_average_price

select count(*) from CMIS_PRO where not product_last_average_price is null
and product_name like '%${keyword}%'
and title like '%${keyword}%'
order by product_last_average_price

SELECT CMIS_PRICES.PRODUCT_NAME, CMIS_AR.LOCATION_NAME,MIN(CMIS_PRICES.SALE_PRICE) AS LOCATION_MIN_PRICE, AVG(CMIS_PRICES.SALE_PRICE) AS LOCATION_AVG_PRICE,MAX(CMIS_PRICES.SALE_PRICE) AS LOCATION_MAX_PRICE FROM CMIS_PRICES JOIN CMIS_STORE ON CMIS_PRICES.SHOP_NAME = CMIS_STORE.SHOP_NAME JOIN CMIS_AR ON CMIS_STORE.DISTRIC_CODE = CMIS_AR.LOCATION_CODE WHERE CMIS_PRICES.RESEARCH_DATE = (SELECT MAX(RESEARCH_DATE) FROM CMIS_PRICES) AND PRODUCT_NAME = #{product_name} GROUP BY CMIS_PRICES.PRODUCT_NAME, CMIS_AR.LOCATION_NAME ORDER BY LOCATION_CODE

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, SHOP_KIND_NAME, MIN(SALE_PRICE) AS MIN_PRICE, AVG(SALE_PRICE) AS AVG_PRICE, MAX(SALE_PRICE) AS MAX_PRICE FROM CMIS_PRICES JOIN CMIS_STORE ON CMIS_PRICES.SHOP_NAME = CMIS_STORE.SHOP_NAME JOIN CMIS_BU ON CMIS_STORE.SHOP_KIND_CODE = CMIS_BU.SHOP_KIND_CODE WHERE CMIS_PRICES.RESEARCH_DATE = (SELECT MAX(RESEARCH_DATE) FROM CMIS_PRICES) AND PRODUCT_NAME = #{product_name} GROUP BY PRODUCT_NAME, SHOP_KIND_NAME
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(RESEARCH_DATE,'%Y,%m-1,%d') AS RESEARCH_DATE, AVG(SALE_PRICE) AS SALE_PRICE FROM CMIS_PRICES WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = #{product_name} GROUP BY RESEARCH_DATE ORDER BY RESEARCH_DATE

SELECT CMIS_PRICES.PRODUCT_NAME, CMIS_PRICES.SALE_PRICE ,CMIS_STORE.SHOP_NAME, CMIS_STORE.ADDRESS, ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(LOCATION, ST_GEOMFROMTEXT( ${lon} ${lat} )) AS DISTANCE
FROM CMIS_STORE JOIN CMIS_PRICES ON CMIS_STORE.SHOP_NAME = CMIS_PRICES.SHOP_NAME
WHERE ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(LOCATION, ST_GEOMFROMTEXT( ${lon} ${lat})) <= 5000
AND CMIS_PRICES.RESEARCH_DATE = (SELECT MAX(RESEARCH_DATE) FROM CMIS_PRICES)
AND PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}
ORDER BY CMIS_PRICES.SALE_PRICE
LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM CMIS_PRO WHERE SUB_CATEGORY = #{sub_category} and product_name != #{product_name} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3
